des: "This is a refreshing and delicious melon drink that is easy to make and super tasty too! If this is too much for your blender, then make it in two batches and combine in a pitcher. If you are able to chill before serving it is delicious!  Great for an afternoon grill session!"
ins: Put the cantaloupe in a blender. Pour sweetened condensed milk and water over the cantaloupe; blend until smooth. Serve over ice.
